rule.message: Interface names should comply with a naming convention
rule.name: InterfaceNameRule
rule.description: Interface names should begin with 'I' and follow Pascal case.

rule.message: Methods should not have too many arguments
rule.name: TooManyArgumentsRule

rule.message: Methods should not have too many variables
rule.name: TooManyVariablesRule
rule.description: Method has too many variables, maximum number of variables is 10
